TITLE Greek Feta & Spinach Burgers

# In a medium bowl, season [1.5 lbs ground lamb] with [salt] and [pepper]. Mix in [10 oz frozen chopped spinach[, thawed and squeezed dry]], [1/4 cup mint [minced]], [3 tbl [grated] onion], [2 cloves garlic[minced]]. Add [1/2 cup [crumbled] feta cheese] and mix gently to just combine.
# Form the meat mixture into 4 patties (thinner in the center for even cooking).

# In a medium nonstick skillet, heat a drizzle of [olive oil] over medium-high. Cook the patties, turning occasionally, until browned on both sides. Douse the burgers with the juice of half [1/2 item lemon].

# In another medium bowl, toss [2 cup [chopped] Romaine], [1 item tomato [,chopped ]], [1/2 tsp dried oregano], and juice [1/2 item lemon]; season.
# Top [4 item ciabatta roll] bottoms with some of the salad, the patties and the roll tops.
